### [Readonly](https://github.com/type-challenges/type-challenges/blob/main/questions/00007-easy-readonly/README.md)
[Answer](https://www.typescriptlang.org/play?#-iYXSoNQa-nNTZYBrqsIq7XIMaYDUQYDACAAUTUUzUnK+2B+lUBwNUfR2sqoFxmdEIlLFDUNxtNOGVEA15FtkO9vv9QZDYe+v22khjvWruwIEymydTsTRzUVADU5MgigtVABxUpatjkTkMOh0HwSJF+jGGBgNPQSBpQrLAaBgEDAKygCAAfUPR+PR4gAE1ytC2kyIDqNAeT4-9xBt1YUx8pTLEvhUoqVeSoHjb8IAAbQABXqVQzHwW4UgAXU5FJwLgsABTAPcn0fZYnEqFpUDWHpMJPF8dzkXwoQ2AYwlJQMAEc2FQXADgDWFBmMCA+Qgfgpi8CAAHJuHfZA4AXRj-B5JxgAqBQJD4t8qM+fD5hVECiBYti6CSAN6MYpJP00b9UjFABGNIDi-bQjKwUy0jMsAULAbFcXxQkTNVSlShpDp6SgTNWXZc0uR8z5MERdZXk5chrX8PgiECOhUE5ACoF6ComFDIKeQdNCMKI092FmM5oQAZRxacHzy59X1AIhFWKhhbTCGC2GhCRMFwaT2nHSdp1nYB50XZdVzUddoGAPgJCKPJaogbte1WdrOuFbqpxnOcjUGlc1w3YA2o6gLMQgRUJShMIWgasYghyGcIAnVa+oGpctpGrcdyAA)

`in` が重要

```typescript
type MyReadonly<T> = {
  readonly [P in keyof T]: T[P]
}
```

`in keyof` で 反復処理のような動きをする

### [Tuple to Object](https://github.com/type-challenges/type-challenges/blob/main/questions/00011-easy-tuple-to-object/README.md)
[Answer](https://www.typescriptlang.org/play?#-cXEACaOwC6MWwQiz8NFouGSOBcphQGAim1QYyQ+FICVwAB5QSl8P48KssAA+CDAYADQYpagtCAAbzu+zYhx242pByOJzO7xuDLej2ur1ZXJeHN5zx5D0uXwFIs+OwAvrQZlNuviAGocLAAdzi-FsuAAEigSAzMrhcGg2ONCXNKJkOmQ2B0ggBzYCwMAgYC6UAQAD63p9vp9n3wKBcEAAwg8INqsBCvX7Y56IK7dOicHDsAikaoUUhifsuGl-hDZGk+BhWM5mFtvvjNhTaFsAAqRZBbLgoYKVFzfb4M+tgGVgD1x2PIUwREPyUwxof+xMcUZBCLJykQACiAEcUIVvCuSaoIFKIP56qEdkJk-BLYVsFx7aZgChzBg2DtdIDljiNts9kzhWzf3z-1FH4-gBJYaDfRccQAOTbDtPy2aBvAAJm8K5vAAFl+eRQKBMAIPYZhgjgTYAGVCJIfAMAEaBxDwsCCOCJDPzI9tKIEJDaPwlYxhYijLk2LYFCI7whKQrD-gguigWxMYAFkOEGeDELuJDbjQu50NuIToHEnCzCTMEAQnf4BNoHdSVRddNwwLMcXTFRqDRMFMRk7BcW8KkaUODkvOZO5BW5cU-xZCV+X80LAMlIKuS+fdcXcszd0cqzCls+FEQc1Fkxc7jsBg9so3c5doAZZSkIZFDrgZdT0IZdC4oSqBzMzFKbNTLB7ORJyMSxXKsF4yiiqpQTCJ0hlsqxbTvBGxjuySHqGKYqV4s8RKLJRVq0rTDKuom1ysHkwYhpgUqTlUjlVNQ6qTk0jlNOm7S5r27SGtW753SJM82HgIYLJ+twgjAJco3qYNYTsnbMy2BDkO+DypSrd0QCnad4x6INcGyYMSP2E0UenBM3VAWh8RIzI2hwZhA2DNhKIfCw-ANI0TTNYALStG07RcR1YGAZw2FVKMSYgZU1XYOnzCWJnjVNc02Eta1bQdJ1oGAWmiklvxhdkoIcBDcmMGvW9TQgQ0ZdZ9nFa5+0XTdIA)

同じく `in` が重要。 `in T[number]` で反復処理をした P を使う。

ちなみに PropertyKey というのがあるのを初めて知った。
- https://github.com/type-challenges/type-challenges/issues/19940
- https://www.totaltypescript.com/concepts/propertykey-type
